explains: n. 医生，（尤指）内科医生；抚慰者
wordGroup: family physician 家庭医生；家庭医师

sentences.en: The physician may prescribe but not administer the drug.
sentences.cn: 内科医师可以开处方但不可发药。

sentences.en: I'm a practising physician trying to help people here and now.
sentences.cn: 我眼下是一名尽力帮助别人的专业医师。

sentences.en: He was a consultant physician, a serious man dedicated to his calling.
sentences.cn: 他是一名顾问医生，一个专注于其使命的严肃认真的人。
